DataElement.preferredName: Wechsler Intelligence Scale for Children - Fifth Edition Digit Span Total Scaled Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the total scaled scores for the Digit Span subtests in the Wechsler Intelligence Scale for Children, Fifth Edition.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Wechsler Intelligence Scale for Children - Fifth Edition Digit Span Total Score Scaled Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The fifth version of the Wechsler Intelligence Scale for Children that was published in 2014. It is an individually administered clinical instrument for assessing the cognitive ability of children aged 6 years through 16 years 11 months. It is a psychometric test that assesses a child's current cognitive abilities in both verbal and nonverbal areas, including verbal comprehension, perceptual reasoning, working memory, and processing speed._The sum of the scores for the Digit Span Forward, Digit Span Backward, and Digit Span Sequencing scales of the Wechsler Intelligence Scale for Children._Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.
